mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fishing Notes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Evans, George Bird
mdRecord.dcterms:description: George and Kay describe their outings hunting and fishing in Braddock, Stoney Fork, Laurel Run, Sandy Creek, Cucumber Creek, and Trout Spring Hollow. They write about hunting with their dog Speck for grouse, squirrel, quail, and rabbit. They spot deer on their walks, and make note of the weather and terrain in several entries. Shooting Sketch Book begins on page 33.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anecdotes
